div:
Metal–ligand covalency enables room temperature molecular qubit candidates †
†Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Methods and additional characterization and discussion. Crystallographic information of 1, 3–8 can be obtained from the Cambridge Structural Database CCDC 1877212–1877218. For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c9sc00074g
